name: Slot
description:
Felling lucky, then try you luck with Slot a fun and easy to play slot machine simulation game that brings you all the glitz and glam of the Vegas Strip, anytime anywhere.

Kick-start your wild Vegas adventure with 1,000 coins how much can you win ?

If you want to try out the best slots games, don't even think about going anywhere else, Slot comes With 5 different easy to play slot machines, from From slick classic 3-reel and 5-reel games to the big jackpot chest or wheel mini games!
